newsitem.title: USA: Dynatec to acquire Nordic Lites.
newsitem.headline: Dynatec to acquire Nordic Lites.

text.p: Dynatec said on Tuesday it has ented a tentative deal to buy the principal assets of Nordic Lites, a maker of flashlight products based in Fort Worth, Texas, for an undisclosed number of Dynatech restricted common shares.
It is anticipated that a definitive purchase agreement will be completed before the end of the month.

No assurance can be given that a definitive agreement will be completed, or that contingencies will be satisfied, Dynatec said. However, principals of both companies are optimistic that the transaction will be completed.
